title: Chamizal National Memorial: People
body: People         Presidents Lyndon B. Johnson of the United States of America and President Adolfo Lopez Mateos of Mexico El Paso Herald-Post  Follow the links below to learn about some of the people who played a role in the Chamizal story. Lyndon Baines Johnson: His Life and Legacy Biography of Adolfo Lopez Mateos (Coming Soon!)
